snippet: The suspended Miami lineman Richie Incognito said he went too far in his comments to teammate Jonathan Martin, but the exchanges were in the context of their friendship.
abstract: Suspended Miami Dolphins lineman Richie Incognito, in Fox Sports interview, says he went too far in his comments to teammate Jonathan Martin, but that exchanges were in the context of their friendship.
lead_paragraph: The suspended Miami lineman Richie Incognito said he went too far in his comments to teammate Jonathan Martin, but the exchanges were in the context of their friendship.

headline.main: Incognito Tries to Add Context to His Statements
headline.print_headline: Incognito Tries to Add Context to His Statements
